definition: variant of 連綴|连缀[lian2 zhui4]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
to sew/to stitch together/to combine/to link/to connect/to put words together/to compose/to embellish

sentences.english: Power and prestige of the Qupai gongs, Chengzhang both independent and combination sets.
sentences.chinese: 威風鑼鼓的曲牌，既獨立成章，又聯綴成套。
